title: Vision problems with Tryndamere and Wukong (Ranked)

replies.body: im pretty sure an ignited target grants vision on the target.

as someone who plays alot of shaco, no it does not. Ignite reveals you in the fog of war, but if you stealth you stay invisible. That wukong thing was a bug, though if tryndamere was mid-aa when wukong stealthed than you'll still be hit, ie if I shaco q away from a vayne, the silver bolt can still pin me to a wall.
